tag_list: design, user-experience, ux, program-management, innovation, branding, marketing, agency, agency-management, agency-search, agency-spotter, experience-rethink, agencyspotter, atlanta, nyc, boston
overview:
Former Group Director of Global Design at The Coca-Cola Company, Brian is the CEO of Agency Spotter, a start-up positioned to be the go to place for businesses to find and develop great relationships with creative agencies. He is also the founder and creative lead for Experience Rethink, a user experience and design innovation agency.

Though he started his early career in web design and development, Brian has led many different types of teams, solving business challenges using a blend of insights, technology and design. His diverse range of work includes brands such as Bacardi, Coca-Cola, General Motors, The Home Depot, Minute Maid, NXP Semiconductors, Philips, Sonicare, Sprite, vitaminwater and WebMD.
